profileAlternative.name: Mihai Chiorean
profileAlternative.headline: Senior Software Engineer, Invision
profileAlternative.summary: Experienced Software Engineer with a demonstrated history of working in the internet industry. Strong engineering professional skilled in Node, Go

aboutAlternative.text: Experienced Software Engineer with a demonstrated history of working in the internet industry. Strong engineering professional skilled in Node, Go

positions.title: Software Engineer
positions.description:
Full stack developer responsible for building REST APIs and web services with mainly NodeJS and MongoDB as a main data store, build internal tools, automate deployments on AWS with SaltStack.
Some iOS development involved too.

positions.title: SW Developer
positions.description: Design, development, maintenance Symbian S60 applications. Technologies and tools used: C++, Qt, Carbide, Qt Creator.

positions.title: Web developer
positions.description: During my employment here I've worked on developing new applications using mostly PHP and MySQL together with JavaScript (JQuery). Also maintenance work for some older projects was among my tasks.

given.text: Mihai has great programming skills, fast learning ability and he's a good teamplayer!

received.text: We have worked together on the same project and I can say that Adam is a developer you can count on in terms of coding skills, software architecture and team support. He has done great work here.

items: Machine Learning - online course from Stanford Engineering
